attributes.additional_details: I feel that there should be stricter rules about smoking, it should be designated areas, I have asthma and when I go out you can guarentee that I will have a breath of smoke, people don't care where they blow out their smoke, it is a fact.They reckon they are the ones without choice, what choice do I have and others with chest complaints and illnesses have with people who blow smoke in our faces, they are not suppose to be within 10 yds of a doorway but they are right outside and I have to put a hanky or something over my mouth and nose before I can enter. How selfish are these people, Even when I smoked a long time ago, I thought about others, I wouldn't do it, don't understand people of today, there is no standards or respect.......
